column4: I tried to change my dns from google's to opendns but I still get no connection. Any ideas?
I mean I have a connection but i can't get on the internet
just fix it up the way you think it should be, then we can take a look at it
The way I had it before when it was working was as "nameserver 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4" but on different lines of course
the way you it should be with opendns
that's not opendns, that's google's dns?
thast not my router IP though
Do you mean to put the search hsd2.va.comcast.net. in my resolv.conf?
if you use google's does it work right away 8.8.8.8.8?
